IncidentDef.label: silt strider pass
IncidentDef.letterText: An enormous silt strider has wandered into the area. Often used to carry a large quantity of resources across vast distances, taming it would prove highly beneficial. Of course you could also hunt it instead, for its sturdy chitin plates. Regardless of what you choose, it will not stay here for long.

IncidentDef.label: wandering daedroth
IncidentDef.letterText: A daedroth has wandered into the area. A terrifying beast with a strange connection to psychic energy, a tame daedroth would be a valuable pet. Of course you could also hunt it instead, for its resistant hide. Of course the daedroth may have other plans, and will likely want to fill its belly, before it wanders off once more.

IncidentDef.label: wandering ogrim
IncidentDef.letterText: A large ogrim has wandered into the area. A terrifying beast of untold strength, a tame ogrim would be a valuable pet. Of course you could also hunt it instead, for its resistant hide. Of course the ogrim may have other plans, and will likely want to fill its belly, before it wanders off once more.

IncidentDef.label: cliff racer swarm
IncidentDef.letterText: A large swarm of {0} cliff racers has entered the area, and doesn't seem to be going anywhere anytime soon. It may be best to deal with them quickly, as they could affect the balance of the ecosystem... or of your colony.
